Rehoboth is crossed by US-44 and Route 118, in which they intersect one another near the town's geographic center. Interstate 95 is only about 10 minutes away in nearby South Attleboro. A 20-minute drive to/from Providence, Rhode Island and a 40-minute drive to/from Plymouth via US-44.

value: ), Westcoat Drive, East Taunton, Phone: +1 508-821-2973, Fax: +1 508-821-3723. Small regional airport with 3,500ft and 2,500ft runways.
The Greater Attleboro Taunton Regional Transit Authority (GATRA)
, (Route #19) designated stop: Anawan St./Route 118, Toll Free: +1-800-483-2500, Phone: +1 508-823-8828, Fax: +1 508-824-3474, TDD: +1 508-824-7439, email: customercomments@gatra.org,
. Convenient and relatively inexpensive city bus service to/from Taunton via Providence, Rhode Island, including the town of Seekonk. Fares: $2 o/w to/from Providence, $1.75 o/w to/from Taunton.

content=Taunton. Kayak and canoe rentals are offered, as well as a variety of guided tours/trips (with rated skill levels) throughout the local Narragansett Bay Watershed. The guided tours/trips that is offered are the following: kayak, canoe, photography, snorkeling, swimming, moonlit, kids kayak camp, etc.
